title: Ian Karmel
description: Ian Karmel (comedy! portland! @iankarmel!) is a ball of light, love and laughter and is a joy to behold. Pete was so glad to work with Ian, who opens regularly for Kyle Kinane (chic-ago!) and is a staple of the blossoming Portland comedy scene. Pete and Ian got to combine their joy forces at Pete's hotel in Portland and this is the wonderful result. Please enjoy, weirdos!
